benefits.title: Excellence in every detail
benefits.subtitle: We are not a conventional car wash. We are a detailing studio dedicated to perfection and automotive preservation.

premium_quality.title: Premium Quality
premium_quality.description: Top-of-the-line products and professional techniques that guarantee exceptional results.

lasting_protection.title: Lasting Protection
lasting_protection.description: Advanced ceramic treatments that protect your investment for years, not weeks.

advanced_technology.title: Advanced Technology
advanced_technology.description: State-of-the-art equipment for a finish without swirls or holograms.

attention_to_detail.title: Attention to Detail
attention_to_detail.description: We obsess over every corner of your vehicle, where others don't look.

premium_products.title: Premium Products
premium_products.description: We work exclusively with the best international detailing product brands.

initial_evaluation.title: Initial Evaluation
initial_evaluation.description: Detailed vehicle inspection to identify imperfections and determine the best treatment.

decontamination.title: Decontamination
decontamination.description: Deep chemical and mechanical cleaning to remove contaminants adhered to the paint.

paint_correction.title: Paint Correction
paint_correction.description: Multi-stage polishing process to remove scratches, water marks, and restore shine.

ceramic_protection.title: Ceramic Protection
ceramic_protection.description: Application of ceramic coating to protect the paint and facilitate future cleaning.

curing_delivery.title: Curing and Delivery
curing_delivery.description: Curing time under IR lamps and final review before delivery to the customer.

disclaimers.title: Disclaimers
disclaimers.subtitle: Please review our disclaimers, to fully understand how we handle your interactions with this website.
disclaimers.service_text: Detailing results vary depending on: Previous vehicle condition. Surface deterioration. Environmental conditions. 100% defect correction is not guaranteed.
disclaimers.vehicle_text: While we take every precaution to ensure the safety of your vehicle while in our care, we are not liable for loss or damage due to theft, fire, or natural disasters beyond our control. We are not responsible for pre-existing damage.
disclaimers.links_text: The Site may contain links to other websites or content belonging to or originating from third parties. Such external links are not investigated, monitored, or checked for accuracy, adequacy, validity, reliability, availability, or completeness by us.
disclaimers.advice_text: The information on our website is for general informational purposes only. It should not be considered professional advice. Always seek the advice of a qualified professional with any questions you may have.

cookie.subtitle: Please review our privacy policy, to fully understand how we handle your interactions with this website.
cookie.intro_text: Welcome to the Cookie Policy of Ta' To' Clean. This policy explains how our website uses cookies and similar technologies to ensure proper functionality, enhance user experience, and support our service processes, including booking management, customer interaction, and analytics. This Cookie Policy must be read together with our Privacy Policy and Terms & Conditions.
cookie.important_purpose_text: This Cookie Policy explains: What cookies are. What types of cookies we use. Why we use them. How users can manage, disable, or delete cookies. Which third parties may set cookies through our website.
cookie.important_controller_text: Ta' To' Clean is responsible for the processing of data associated with cookies used on our website.
cookie.what_are_text: Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit our website. They allow us to recognize your browser, remember preferences, support technical processes such as appointment bookings, and improve performance. Cookies may be: Session cookies: deleted once the browser closes. Persistent cookies: remain on your device for a defined period. First-party: set by Ta' To' Clean. Third-party: set by external service providers.
cookie.types_necessary_text: These cookies are essential for the operation of the website and for enabling services such as: Completing appointment reservations. Temporarily storing booking information (name, email, phone, preferred date, and vehicle plate). Website security and fraud prevention. Technical functionality. These cookies cannot be disabled.
cookie.types_functional_text: Used to improve the user experience by remembering: Language settings. Basic page preferences. Optional form data retention.
cookie.types_analytical_text: Used to evaluate: How users interact with the booking process. Most visited sections of the website. Website performance, bounce rates, and errors. Third-party analytics may include: Google Analytics, Meta Pixel, Hosting provider monitoring tools. These require user consent.
cookie.types_marketing_text: Used to: Measure advertisement effectiveness. Conduct remarketing campaigns. Build anonymized interest profiles. These require explicit consent.
cookie.info_collected_text: Depending on the type of cookie, they may collect: IP address, Device characteristics, Browser type, Session identifiers, Booking process steps, User click interactions, Date and time of visits. Cookies do not store raw personal data (name, email, phone, or license plate), but may interact with systems where such data is submitted securely.
cookie.managing_text: Users can configure, accept, or reject cookies (except necessary cookies) through the cookie banner and through browser settings. Limiting cookies may affect booking functionality.
cookie.updates_text: Ta' To' Clean may update this policy at any time. The 'Last Updated' date will reflect changes.

privacy.subtitle: Please review our privacy policy, to fully understand how we handle your interactions with this website.
privacy.intro_text: Ta' To' Clean is committed to safeguarding your personal data. This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, store, and protect your information when you access our website, use our services, or interact with us. This policy complies with Colombian data protection law (Law 1581 of 2012, Decree 1377 of 2013).
privacy.collection_text: We collect information that you provide directly to us when: You create an account. You book a service. You contact us for support.
privacy.collection_personal_text: Full name, Email address, Phone number, Address (when required for mobile services).
privacy.collection_vehicle_text: Vehicle plate, Brand and model (optional), User-assigned nickname.
privacy.collection_technical_text: IP address, Browser type, Cookie data (see our Cookie Policy).
privacy.use_text: We use your information to: Process bookings and manage appointments. Communicate with you about your services. Improve our services and user experience. Send promotional updates (with your consent). Comply with legal obligations.
privacy.storage_text: Your data is stored on Supabase (secure database provider) with cloud-located servers. We retain your data while you maintain an active account or as necessary to provide services. You can request data deletion at any time.
privacy.sharing_text: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties, except: Service providers (e.g., Supabase for storage). When required by law. With your explicit consent.
privacy.cookies_text: See our Cookie Policy for detailed information on how we use cookies and similar technologies.
privacy.security_text: We implement technical and organizational measures to protect your data against unauthorized access, loss, or damage. However, no system is 100% secure.
privacy.minors_text: Our services are not directed to individuals under 18 years of age. We do not knowingly collect information from minors.
privacy.updates_text: We may update this Privacy Policy occasionally. We will notify you of significant changes by email or through a notice on our website.
privacy.contact_text: For privacy questions or data requests, contact us at: Email: privacy@tatotoclean.com

terms.subtitle: Please review our terms and conditions to fully understand how we handle your interactions with this website.
terms.intro_text: These Terms and Conditions govern the use of Ta' To' Clean's website, booking platform, and services. By using our website, you agree to these Terms.
terms.services_text: Ta' To' Clean provides automotive detailing and cleaning services. We reserve the right to refuse service to anyone for any reason at any time.
terms.booking_text: Bookings are subject to availability. Prices for our services are subject to change without notice.
terms.booking_process_text: Bookings are made through our website. You must provide accurate vehicle and contact information. You will receive a confirmation email once the booking is complete.
terms.booking_payment_text: Payment is processed at the time of service. We accept multiple payment methods. Prices include applicable taxes.
terms.accounts_text: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account. You must not share your access credentials. We reserve the right to suspend or terminate accounts that violate these Terms.
terms.liability_text: Ta' To' Clean shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential or punitive damages, including without limitation, loss of profits, data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses.
terms.cancellation_text: You may cancel your booking up to 24 hours before the scheduled time for a full refund. Late cancellations may be subject to a fee.
terms.ip_text: All content on this website (text, graphics, logos) is owned by Ta' To' Clean and protected by intellectual property laws. You may not use our content without explicit permission.
terms.changes_text: We reserve the right, at our sole discretion, to modify or replace these Terms at any time. Significant changes will take effect 30 days after posting.

cookie_consent.message: We use cookies to improve your experience and analyze our traffic. By continuing to browse, you agree to our cookie policy.
